newsitem.title: JAPAN: Advantest to boost output capacity of chip testers.
newsitem.headline: Advantest to boost output capacity of chip testers.

text.p: Advantest Corp said on Wednesday that it would increase its production capacity for semiconductor testing devices by about 35 percent by May 1998 compared with the current level.
As a result of the increase, the maker of measuring instruments will be able to produce 150 semiconductor testing devices a month from the current 110 units per month, a company spokesman said.
The move is in response to rising demand for such devices, the spokesman said, without elaborating.
